org.primaresearch.web.gwt.client.ui.page.tool.drawing

Interface PageViewToolListener


  • public interface PageViewToolListener
    Listener interface for tools that can be plugged in to the document page view.
    Author:
    clc

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onToolFinished(PageViewTool tool, boolean success)
      Notifies the listener that a tool has finished.

    • Method Detail

      • onToolFinished

        void onToolFinished(PageViewTool tool,
                  boolean success)
        Notifies the listener that a tool has finished.
        Parameters:
        success - true if the tool has finished successful or false if it has been cancelled.
